infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Pacibaby requires access to your camera to predict the size of Pacibabyr
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Pacibaby needs to access your camera roll in order to predict the size of Pacibabyr
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Pacibaby needs to access your camera roll so that you can upload photo and predict the size of Pacibabyr
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
